name: Buttermilk Potato Salad
keywords: buttermilk, new potatoes, gluten-free, low cholesterol, low-fat, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Scrub the potatoes, and boil until tender but firm. (For large potatoes, this will be about 45 minutes.) Drain. Do not peel.
Combine the remaining ingredients in a bowl.

Cool the potatoes slightly, and cut into 1-inch cubes. Stir gently into the buttermilk dressing. The salad can be eaten immediately but will be more flavorful if refrigerated for an hour or overnight.
